access_denied__ask_your_admin: Ask the administrator to give you access to this page.
access_denied__or_notify_a_bug: If you believe it is a mistake of FacturaScripts, do not hesitate to notify it. Click the help button, at top right and report the error.
access_denied__you_cant_access_to_this_p: You don't have permission to access this page.
admin_empresa__allow_less_secure_certifi: Allowing unsafe server certificates: self-signed certificates are commonplace on dedicated, but unsafe servers. Enable this option if you can't connect to your mail server even if the data is correct.
admin_empresa__help_for_configure_more_o: In order to configure the other options of the company you must install the plugin facturacion_base.
admin_empresa__help_for_loading: If you have problems configuring the loading.es email, use port 25 and TLS encryption.
admin_empresa__help_send_copies: You can write an email to send copy of everything.
admin_empresa__msg_error_cant_connect_to: Couldn't connect via email. Is the password correct?
admin_empresa__msg_error_ext_openssl_not: Can't find the OpenSSL extension, essential for sending emails.
admin_empresa__title_if_not_gmail: If you don't use Gmail or Google Apps, fill in also this information
admin_home__admins_can_always_access: Administrators can access from any IP.
admin_home__check_column_types: Check the types of table columns
admin_home__controler_not_found_or_disab: Controller not found or belongs to an inactive plugin
admin_home__danger_no_touch: Danger: Don't touch if you do not know what you do.
admin_home__help_add_plugin: If you have a plugin in a .zip file, you can upload it and install it from here.
admin_home__help_currency_symbol: Decimal and thousands separator settings can be applied only to print listings and formats. For the editable fields, the operating system configuration is used.
admin_home__help_development: These are sensitive configuration parameters of FacturaScripts. Do not modify them if you do not know what you do.
admin_home__help_facturascripts_core_ins: You already have the core installed. As you can see, the core allows you to manage pages, plugins and users. Press continue to continue with the installation.
admin_home__help_integer_type: Type to use in the database (MySQL).
admin_home__help_plugins:
The core only handles the management of users, plugins and pages. For everything else you have the plugins. In the Downloads tab you have available the main plugins. Choose those you need. There is everything and the list is updated periodically.
The installed plugins have them in the tab Plugins. You can add plugins manually, if you wish, and you can also enable or disable, even remove them. In addition, all basic invoicing and accounting has been moved to the facturacion_base plugin. You can download it automatically and install it by pressing this button.
admin_home__invoices_translations: INVOICE and INVOICES are translated only in the sales documents. SIMPLIFIED_INVOICE is used in the tickets.
admin_home__msg_can_download_from_downlo: .You can download this plugin from the Downloads tab.
admin_home__msg_error_cant_write_plugins: You don't have write permissions on the plugins/%1$s
admin_home__msg_error_not_perms_to_delet: You don't have permission to delete plugins.
admin_home__msg_error_not_perms_to_downl: You don't have permission to download plugins.
admin_home__msg_error_not_perms_to_uploa: You don't have permission to upload plugins.
admin_home__msg_error_only_admin_can: Only an administrator can make changes on this page.
admin_home__msg_pages_auto_disabled: The following pages have been automatically deleted: %1$s.
admin_home__msg_pages_auto_enabled: The following pages have been automatically enabled: %1$s.
admin_home__no_plugins_installed: You do not have any plugins installed.
admin_home__only_on_mysql: It can only be disabled in MySQL.
admin_home__title_unstable: Unstable: do not install it unless you know what you do
admin_info__help_eneboo: FacturaScripts is compatible with the official modules of Eneboo 2.3, not with the dozens of customizations that exist. If you need modifications, look for a FacturaScripts Partner.
admin_info__help_info: Here you have basic information about this installation of FacturaScripts, database, list of tables and history of errors with multiple filters, to facilitate your work in finding a fault.
admin_info__help_plugin_sql_editor: Remember that you can use the sql_editor plugin to make sql queries in the database.
admin_rol__press_to_regenerate: Press Apply to regenerate user permissions.
admin_rol__user_can_delete_on_page: The user has permissions to delete on this page
admin_user__admin_has_full_access: Administrators have access to any page.
admin_user__confirm_delete_user: Do you really want to delete the user?
admin_user__create_employee_and_assign: Create a new employee and assign this user
admin_user__help_new_employee_and_assign: An employee will be created and assigned to this user.
admin_user__help_system_info: You can see more details from Admin > System Information.
admin_user__msg_demo_only_edit_your_user: In demo mode you can only modify the user's data. This is so to avoid bad practices among users who test the demo.
admin_user__msg_not_allowed_to_modify: You don't have permission to edit this data.
admin_user__msg_only_admin_can: Only an administrator can create and assign an employee from here.
admin_user__msg_user_cant_access_pages: You have not authorized this user to access any page and therefore you will not be able to do anything. You can give access to any page from the authorize tab.
admin_user__user_have_perms_to_delete_on: The user has permissions to delete on this page
admin_users__help_anon_login: Install the login_anonimo plugin so that the list of users does not appear in the login screen.
admin_users__help_permissions: Here you can quickly see which users have permission to access each page. In highlighted those who have permissions to view, modify and delete, the rest have only permissions to view and modify.
admin_users__help_roles: Roles allow you to define permission packages to quickly apply to users, instead of going one by one.
admin_users__help_system_info: You can see more details from Admin > System Information.
admin_users__help_users: You can have employees who do not have access to FacturaScripts, or users who are not employees, so it is separated.
admin_users__msg_admin_only_create_users: Only an administrator can create users.
admin_users__msg_demo_cant_delete_user: In demo mode users can't be deleted. This is so to avoid bad practices among users who test the demo.
admin_users__msg_only_admin_can_delete_u: Only an administrator can delete users.
agente__msg_error_employee_name_less_50_: The employee name can't exceed 50 characters.
agente__msg_error_employee_surname_less_: The employee's surname can't exceed 100 characters.
api__no_api_version: Absence FacturaScripts API Version. Updates the client.
api__update_facturascripts: Incorrect FacturaScripts API Version. Updates the client.
cron__cant_connect_database: Unable to connect to the database!
cron__cron_still_working: ERROR: There is already a cron running. If you think it is a bug, go to Admin > System Information to solve the problem.
cron__executing_plugin_cron:
***********************
We run cron.php of the plugin %1$s
divisa__msg_error_conversion_rate_not_0: The conversion rate can not be 0.
divisa__msg_error_conversion_rate_not_0_: The conversion rate for purchases can not be 0.
ejercicio__msg_error_data_out_of_range: The selected date is outside the exercise range. A better date has been selected.
empresa__msg_error_resumed_company_name_: The Short Name %1$s must be shorter than the Name.
feedback__help_help: Details your doubt or problem if you want it answered.
footer__a_lot_of_plugins: More than 50 plugins with a very active development.
footer__help_demo_facturascripts: This demo give you a quick idea of ​​how FacturaScripts works, with a reduced number of active plugins and many options deactivated. Keep in mind that there are dozens of people using this demo at a time.
footer__list_work_anywhere: Work from any PC, tablet or smartphone.
footer__professional_support: Professional support at your disposal through the Partners.
footer__simply_forms: Simple forms with the essential options.
fs_user__msg_created_default_admin_accou: The admin user has been created with the admin password.
fs_user__msg_invalid_user_nick: Nick %1$s is invalid. Must be between 3 and 12 characters, worth numbers or letters, but not Ñ or accents.
fs_user__msg_pass_between_1_32_chars: The password must be between 1 and 32 characters.
fscache__msg_error_conexion: Failed to connect to Memcache server.
fscontroller__msg_ip_baneada: Your IP has been banned. You will have to wait 10 minutes before trying again.
fscontroller__msg_ip_blocked: You can not access from this IP.
fscontroller__msg_required_php_version: FacturaScripts needs PHP 5.3 or higher, and you have PHP %1$s.
fscontroller__user_cerrado_sesion: The user has closed the session
fsmysql__ext_mysql_not_installed: You do not have the PHP extension for MySQL installed.
fspostgresql__ext_psql_not_installed: You do not have the PHP extension for PostgreSQL installed.
header__meta_description: FacturaScripts is a billing and accounting software for SMEs. It is free software under the GNU/LGPL license.
header__this_browser_not_support_frames: This browser does not support frames.
index__cant_write_tmp_folder: You can't write to the tmp folder of FacturaScripts
index__help_controller_not_found: The controller for this page is not found. Check with the administrator.
index__help_if_you_think_its_a_bug: If you think it is an error of FacturaScripts, do not hesitate to notify me. Click the help button
index__help_notify_me: And notify me of the error. Try not to ignore important information: Have you updated from FacturaScripts 2014 or earlier? Are you from Eneboo/Abanq? Have you reinstalled the beast? They are important questions when looking for a mistake.
index__question_are_you_a_new_developer: Are you a developer and are you trying to make a plugin?
index__question_did_you_update_from_fact: Have you updated from FacturaScripts 2014 or earlier?
install__cant_write_on_facturascripts_fo: The folder of FacturaScripts doesn't have write permissions. These permissions are necessary for the system of templates, to install plugins, updates, etc ...
install__error_connecting_database: Unable to connect to the database. Review user data and password.
install__help_database_socket: Only in some hosts it is necessary to specify the MySQL socket.
install__help_distributions: The default configuration of these distributions, in particular SELinux, blocks any attempt to check if the folder has write permissions. Disable it or modifies the SELinux configuration for the correct operation of FacturaScripts.
install__help_hosting: Try to give write permissions from the FTP client or from the cPanel.
install__help_linux: This command solves the problem in 95% of cases, but you can opt for a more restrictive solution, it is simply necessary for Apache (or PHP) to read and write to the folder.
install__help_mbstring_hosting: Some hosting providers offer versions of PHP too trimmed. It is better to look for a more complete hosting provider, which is the most. Look in our section Recommended Hostings.
install__help_memcached: This section is totally optional. If you have memcached installed, you can specify here the path, port and prefix to use. If not, leave it as is.
install__help_openssl: FacturaScripts needs the OpenSSL extension to be able to download plugins, updates and send emails.
install__help_openssl_hosting: Some hosting providers offer versions of PHP too trimmed. It is better to look for a more complete hosting provider, which is the most. Look in our section Recommended Hostings.
install__help_openssl_linux: It is very rare that a proper installation of PHP on Linux does not include OpenSSL. Try installing the php-openssl package with your package manager and restart Apache. For more information, consult the help or the Linux distribution forums that you use.
install__help_openssl_mac: It is rare that an Apache + PHP + MySQL for Mac package does not include OpenSSL. We offer several packages with everything needed in our section of Downloads.
install__help_us:
Remember that you have the help menu above on the right. If you find any problem, click on inform ... and describe your doubt, suggestion or the error that you have found. We do not know how to make perfect software, but with your help we can get closer increasingly ; -)
And remember that we have a section dedicated to installation in our official documentation:
install__help_use_this_form_for_help: Use this form to inform us. Additional information such as the version of FacturaScripts you use, list of active plugins, PHP version, etc ...
install__help_ziparchive: FacturaScripts needs the ZipArchive extension to be able to unzip plugins and updates.
install__help_ziparchive_hosting: Some hosting providers offer versions of PHP too trimmed. It is better to look for a more complete hosting provider, which is the most. Look in our section of Recommended Hostings.
install__help_ziparchive_linux: Install the php-zip package and restart Apache.
install__install_phpxml: Linux: install php-xml package and restart Apache.
install__obsolete_php: FacturaScripts needs PHP 5.3 or higher. You are using the version %1$s.
install__official_package_for_windows: We offer a version of FacturaScripts for Windows with all necessary software (such as OpenSSL) already included as standard. You can find it in our section of Downloads.
install__php_mysql_not_found: You don't have the PHP extension for MySQL installed.
install__php_pgsql_not_found: You do not have the PHP extension for PostgreSQL installed.
install__point_isnt_the_default_decimal_: The decimal separator of this version of PHP is not the point, as it happens in standard installations. You must correct it.
install__required_mbstring: FacturaScripts needs the mbstring extension to be able to work with non-European characters (Chinese, Korean, Japanese and Russian).
install__required_mbstring_instructions: Install the php-mbstring package and restart Apache.
install__simplexml_not_found: The simplexml extension can not be found in your PHP installation. You must install or activate it.
install__unofficial_package_for_windows: If you decide to use a different packaging, and this does not include what is necessary, you should seek help in the forums or the support of the creators of that packaging.
no_db__answer_2_installed_on_hosting: You have exceeded the hosting fee. Many hostings have usage limits in the database, and if they exceed you block them.
no_db__answer_2_installed_on_pc: You have changed the password of the database. To solve it you must put the original password of the database, or put the new password in the file config.php of FacturaScripts.
no_db__help_cant_connect_database: It has been impossible to connect to the database. The reasons are usually different depending on where you have FacturaScripts installed.
updater__config_not_found: config.php file not found. You can not upgrade without installing.
updater__delayed_fro_problems: Deferred plugin checking until you solve problems.
updater__dont_know_your_keys: Do not know what is your key? You can check it by clicking on the button to See my keys.
updater__help_adminlte: We have worked on a new design to give a more modern appearance to FacturaScripts, with a new side menu, integrated search engine, more user visibility, more and better icons and a long etcetera. This is the result.
updater__help_improvements: We have a number of improvements in the oven that may interest you, but need financing. Do you sign up? You only need 5€.
updater__help_updater: This updater allows updating both the core of FacturaScripts and its plugins, including purchased and private. If there is a core update you will have to update before you can see if there are also updates of plugins.
updater__msg_error_downloading_zip_try_l:
Error downloading zip file.
Try again in a few minutes.
updater__msg_error_with_zip: There has been an error with the update.zip. Code: %1$s. Try again in a few minutes.
updater__msg_error_with_zip_try_later:
There was an error with the file update.zip.
Please try again in a few minutes.
updater__need_solve_errors: You have to correct these errors before continuing.
updater__system_is_updated: The system is up to date.
